summary: A mod for make all vampire dogs bigger and badder.
descriptionHtml:
Hi,
sorry for my english^^.




[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/465862coollogocom2129353.png[/img]

This mod is a body replacer for all vampire dogs in Skyrim.
It's a bully edition, for make your dogs bigger and badder.
[URL=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=389232Capture22.jpg][IMG]http://img4.hostingpics.net/thumbs/mini_389232Capture22.jpg[/IMG][/URL]










[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/496163coollogocom299219.png[/img]
-DLC dawnguard.

-HD textures by ViewtifulFlo:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34460/?]Dawnguard Vampire Dog Retexture by ViewtifulFlo[/url]

*Optional:
-Follower mod by VastoDemon:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37551/?]Death Hound Follower by VastoDemon[/url]






[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/435698coollogocom2992231.png[/img]
*Not compatible for the moment with others dogs mods modifiers, like armors.
author: s666
